name: Vampire's Last Stand
description:
Survive for as long as you can with linked Health and Energy in this endless battler! Most games have a health and energy bar, but what happens when they're one and the same!? In this fast-paced dungeon survival, stay on your toes to constantly balance your health and energy before being overwhelmed by oncoming monsters. Let either your health or your energy drop too low and it's game over!
Made in the 2021 GMTK Game Jam in less than 48 hours.

Created By: 

Amit Prasad - Game Design, Programming

Avi Gell - Game Design, Art

Attributions:
